text:
Pakistan has arrested 20 Indian fishermen and seized four boats for allegedly violating its territorial waters off the coast of Arabian Sea, a maritime official said on Saturday.

The Indian fishermen were arrested by the Pakistan’s Maritime Security Agency while they were fishing in Pakistani waters, an official spokesman told reporters.

“The fishermen have been handed over to the docks police for further legal process,” he said.

The arrests come just a week after Pakistan’s Maritime Security Agency arrested 88 Indian fishermen. — PTI
title: Pakistan arrests 20 Indian fishermen
